title: Local news embraces its consumer product role
description: My work in local news over the last 25 years or so has roughly coincided with the field’s long-term structural decline, which is why the recent groundswell of philanthropic support and community focus on rebuilding what we’ve lost has been so gratifying to me. But in our renewed efforts to irrigate news deserts and save...
